mapper.insert: insert into mentor(mentor_seq, mentor_company, mentor_department, mentor_position, job_code, mentor_school, mentor_career, mentoring_code, mentor_represent, mentor_info, mentor_etc, mentor_email, mentor_selectNaming, mentor_businesscard, mentor_logtime) values(mentor_seq.nextval, #{mentor_company}, #{mentor_department}, #{mentor_position}, #{job_code}, #{mentor_school}, #{mentor_career}, #{mentoring_code}, #{mentor_represent}, #{mentor_info}, #{mentor_etc}, #{mentor_email}, #{mentor_selectNaming}, #{mentor_businesscard}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, tt.* from(select mt.mentor_seq, mb.member_name, mb.member_profile,mt.mentor_company, mt.mentor_department, j.job_type, mentor_school, mentor_career, mentoring_code, mentor_represent, mentor_info, mentor_etc, mentor_email, mentor_selectNaming, mentor_businesscard, mentor_badge, mentor_flag, mentor_logtime from mentor mt, job j, mentors_member mb where mt.mentor_email = mb.member_email and j.job_code = mt.job_code and mentor_flag = #{mentor_flag} order by mt.mentor_seq desc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) from mentor where mentor_flag = #{mentor_flag}

select mb.member_name, mb.member_profile, mentor_seq, mentor_email, mentor_company, mentor_department, mentor_represent, mentoring_code from mentor mt, mentors_member mb where mt.mentor_email = mb.member_email and mentor_seq = #{seq}

mapper.insert: insert into question(question_seq, mentor_seq, member_email, question_title, question_content, question_logtime) values(question_seq.nextval, #{mentor_seq}, #{member_email}, #{question_title}, #{question_content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select e.essayboard_title, e.essayboard_content, e.essayboard_scrap, e.essayboard_logtime from essayboard e, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where e.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mm.member_email = e.mentor_email and mm.member_seq = ${mentor_seq} order by essayboard_logtime desc

select rv.review_content, rv.review_date, mm1.member_name as mentor_name, mm2.member_name as mentee_name, mm2.member_profile, rv.mentee_email from meeting_review rv, mentors_member mm1, mentors_member mm2, meetingboard m where rv.meetingboard_seq = m.meetingboard_seq and rv.mentee_email = mm2.member_email and mm1.member_email = m.mentor_email and mm1.member_seq = ${mentor_seq} order by rv.review_date desc
